feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Hub
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Hub

entry.summary: The Cloud Hub platform has reached general availability, offering a new way to manage your cloud resources. Explore its capabilities and streamline your operations today.
entry.title: Announcement: Cloud Hub is Now Generally Available

entry.content: You can now view Active Assist cost optimization recommendations in Cloud Hub is now in Preview.
entry.summary: Cloud cost optimization recommendations are now available for preview in Cloud Hub.
entry.title: Feature: Active Assist cost optimization recommendations available in Cloud Hub

entry.content: All scheduled and started maintenance activities are now listed together on the Maintenance page. You can use the more_vert Settings menu for scheduled activities that you can modify.
entry.summary: All scheduled and started maintenance activities are now consolidated on the Maintenance page. Use the Settings menu for modifiable scheduled activities.
entry.title: Changed: Maintenance Updates
